Package org.jboss.elemento.svg

Class SVGElementBuilder<E extends SVGElement>

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.elemento.svg.SVGElementBuilder<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Finder<E>, HasElement<E,SVGElementBuilder<E>>, IsElement<E>, HasSVGElement<E,SVGElementBuilder<E>>, TypedBuilder<E,SVGElementBuilder<E>>
public class SVGElementBuilder<E extends SVGElement> extends Object implements HasElement<E,SVGElementBuilder<E>>, HasSVGElement<E,SVGElementBuilder<E>>, Finder<E>
Builder for simple SVG elements. 

svg().css("spinner", "large")
        .aria("label", "Loading...")
        .attr("role", "progressbar")
        .attr("viewBox", "0 0 100 100")
        .add(circle().css("spinner", "path")
                .attr("cx", 50)
                .attr("cy", 50)
                .attr("r", 45)
                .attr("fill", "none"));
